translatePrompt: Ọ ga-amasị gị ịtụgharị asụsụ ya
loginStep0Explanation: Tinye adreesị email gị ka ịmalite.
loginStep1Explanation: Tinye paswọọdụ gị iji nweta akaụntụ gị.
step1Subtitle: Otu ndị ọzọ si ahụ gị ( mkpụrụedemede 3-30)
step3Subtitle: mkpụrụedemede 8 kacha nta, 1 mkpụrụedemede ukwu, nọmba 1
signupStep0Explanation: Tinye adreesị email gị ka ịmepụta akaụntụ gị. Ị nwekwara ike iji nbanye Google maka ịnweta ngwa ngwa.
signupStep1Explanation: Họrọ aha ngosi gị. Nke a bụ ka ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ ga-ahụ gị na uChat.
signupStep2Explanation: Mkpado aha njirimara gị na-amalite na akara @. Ihe nchọpụta pụrụ iche a na-enyere ndị ọzọ aka ịchọta gị. Ọ nweghị onye ọrụ ọzọ nwere ike ịnwe otu mkpado.
signupStep3Explanation: Mepụta paswọọdụ siri ike iji chekwaa akaụntụ gị.
signupStep4Explanation: Kwado okwuntughe gị wee nabata usoro iji debanye aha.
usernameTooShort: Aha ngosi ga-abụrịrị opekata mpe mkpụrụedemede 3
usernameTooLong: Aha ngosi enweghị ike ịgafe mkpụrụedemede 30
handleTooShort: Mkpado aha njirimara ga-abụrịrị opekata mpe mkpụrụedemede 3
handleTooLong: Mkpado aha njirimara enweghị ike ịgafe mkpụrụedemede 15
handleInvalid: Mkpado aha njirimara nwere ike ịnwe naanị mkpụrụedemede, ọnụọgụ na ihe nrịbama
handleNoAt: Etinyekwala @ akara. A ga-agbakwunye ya na-akpaghị aka.
passwordNoUppercase: Okwuntughe ga-enwerịrị opekata mpe otu mkpụrụedemede ukwu
passwordNoNumber: Okwuntughe ga-enwerịrị opekata mpe otu nọmba
